title: Projects
text:
Browse my projects below. Click on any project to read more.


  

GIS

Contamination of Domestic Wells


A spatial analysis of agricultural and ranching contamination threats to domestic well users in California.

View Project →



  

Policy Memo

Sustainable Lithium Extraction in the Imperial Valley


Research and recommendations on sustainable lithium extraction and waste management in Salton Sea.

View Project →



  

R / Data Viz

Study Productivity


Using R to visualize my own daily habits around caffeine, sleep, and study location.

View Project →



  

Report/Analysis

The Revitalization and Leadership of Indigenous Fire Management in Australia


An analysis of the long standing role of Aboriginal fire traditions in the context of Australian fire regimes.

View Project →



  

Technical Report

Erosion, Soils, and Adaptations: Plant Life in Bryce Canyon National Park


A report of how soil forming processes have shaped vegetation and adaptation in Bryce Canyon National Park.

View Project →
